channel.title: How kan i make a portal that
channel.description:
how kan i make a portal that only kan be used when u wear an item (cape) and if u dont wear that item (cape) then send a message. :confused:
who kan help me thats the only thing i need to know for my source. if my source is done i will post it for evryone so they kan use it.
i got great idea's for the source ,but if i dont know how to make a portal that u only let you teleport when u wear that item (cape)
if its done it will be a real new thing on moparscape ;)

item.title: How kan i make a portal that
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

Change that to this:

case 4388: if (playerHasItem(14563)) { sendMessage("You enter Zamorak's Team."); teleportToX = 2412; teleportToY = 3091; } else { sendMessage("Firt Buy Yourself A Zamorak Cape Before You Can Join The Battle"); } break;

Fixed indentations too.

Read full topic

item.title: How kan i make a portal that
item.dc:creator: @dutch123dawn dutch123dawn
item.description:
@dutch123dawn wrote:

hey i have try it but i got some error’s
what do i wrong?

the code looks like this
[table][tr][td]
case 4388:
if (playerHasItem 14563 = true) {
sendMessage(“You enter Zamorak’s Team.”);
teleportToX = 2412;
teleportToY = 3091;

  } else if (playerHasItem 14563 = false { 
       sendMessage("Firt Buy Yourself A Zamorak Cape Before You Can Join The Battle");
  }

   break;[/table]

Read full topic
item.source: How kan i make a portal that

item.title: How kan i make a portal that
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

try this…


   case (Portal ID here):
       if (playerHasItem(CAPE ID HERE) = true) {
(PUT WHAT YOU WANT THE PORTAL TO DO HERE, SUCH AS TELEPORT, GIVE ITEM, ETC...)

      } else if (playerHasItem(SAME CAPE ID HERE) = false { 
           sendMessage("YOUR MESSAGE HERE");
      }

       break;

that code makes it to where if the person has the cape that you want, it does the action that you want such as teleport, give an item, or whatever…
but if he doesnt have that same item, it wont let him and send him a message saying whatever you want it to say… =)
hope that helped

Read full topic
